showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Zack
“Yo! Old guy!
We at Midgar yet?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // Zack
“What're you gonna do
once we get to Midgar?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // Zack
“I know what I'm
gonna do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Zack
“I got a place I can
crash for a while…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Zack
“No wait, the mother
lives there too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Zack
“Yep…gotta change
my plans!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Zack
“Hmm…”{PAUSE}“No matter what I do, I
need some money first…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Zack
“…Hey, wanna start a business?
Now what could we do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // Zack
“Hey, {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“Think there's anything
I'd be good at?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Zack
“Hey old guy!”{PAUSE}“What do you think
I'd be good at?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // Zack
“Try everything…
That's easy for him to say.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // Zack
“Of course!”{PAUSE}“I got more brains and skill than
most other guys!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Zack
“I'm gonna become a mercenary!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // Zack
“Listen, I'm gonna become
a mercenary and that's that.”{PAUSE}“Boring stuff, dangerous stuff,
anything for money.”{PAUSE}“I'm gonna be rich!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // Zack
“So, {Cloud}?
What are YOU gonna do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // Zack
“Just kidding…
I won't leave you hanging like that.”
